newsitem.title: USA: Capstead named to PaineWebber's focus list.
newsitem.headline: Capstead named to PaineWebber's focus list.

text.p: The retail division of PaineWebber Inc Inc on Wednesday said that it added Capstead Mortgage Corp to its focus list.
The list is a portfolio of no more than 30 stocks chosen for their performance potential, PaineWebber said in a statement.
Capstead, based in Dallas, is a mortgage investor, structured as a real estate investment trust, specializing in insured home mortgage loans.
PaineWebber forecast Capstead earnings at $2.35 per share for 1997 and $2.55 per share for 1998.
